title: 07/15/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/15/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Game 4 between the Suns and Bucks with former NBA Player Richard Jefferson. Which was more impressive, Giannis' block last night or Lebron's in Game 7 of the 2016 NBA Finals? Orioles 1st baseman Trey Mancini calls in fresh off his Home Run Derby performance, to discuss the atmosphere at Coors Field on Tuesday and his battle with Colon Cancer. And Chris Mannix explains why the Sixers should hold off on trading Ben Simmons.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Which was more impressive, Giannis' block last night or Lebron's in Game 7 of the 2016 NBA Finals? Orioles 1st baseman Trey Mancini calls in fresh off his Home Run Derby performance, to discuss the atmosphere at Coors Field on Tuesday and his battle with Colon Cancer. And Chris Mannix explains why the Sixers should hold off on trading Ben Simmons.
